320927.「ネーしゃまーっ！\n さっそく みんなで 会いにきたよー！: Zenny! We all came to see you right away!

320928.「ええ……父 主神グランゼニスを\n 目覚めさせる方法に 思い至ったため\n あ:
Yes...I called you children of the covenant
because I have come up with a way to awaken my
father, Gran Zenith.

320929.「眠ってる パパゼニスさまが 目を覚ましたら\n 創失の呪いだって なんとかでき:
If the sleeping Papa Zenith wakes up, maybe we
can do something about the unmaking curse!
...wasn't it Zenny?

320931.「……あ あのっ！ 今のは その……。\n 先日 すてきな 呼び名を いただいた:
Oh, umm..! That was... I received a wonderful
nickname the other day, and I wanted to return
the favor...

320932.「すこしばかり 馴れ馴れしかったです……よね。\n ご不快でしょうから やはり:
I was a little too familiar, wasn't I? I know
you must be uncomfortable, so I will call you
Porte as I used to...

320933.「ううん！ すっごく うれしいよ。\n ありがとね ネーしゃまっ！: No, I'm not! I'm so happy. Thanks Zenny!

320934.「よろしいのですかっ！？\n ……ですが さきほどの みなさまの反応を\n かん:
Are you sure? But in light of your reaction
earlier, I'd like to suggest that you should
be more...

320935.「ポルぽよ……いえ ポルてむ……ポルリーノ\n ……違う こんなのじゃダメ。もっ:
Polpoyo... no, Poltemu... Polrino... no, not
like this. To express this loveliness more and
more...

320939.「いーじゃん ポルるん！\n あたし すっごく 気に入っちゃった♪: I like it so much! I love it so much!

320941.「さて……我が父たる 主神グランゼニスは\n 創生のチカラにて ゼニアスを 創造:
Now... my father Gran Zenith, with the power
of creation, created Zeniath and its
protector, the Guardian Angel.

320942.「守護天使たちに注がれた 創生のチカラは\n 比類なく 強大なもの。彼らが集えば:
The power of creation poured into the
protection angels is incomparably powerful. If
they gather, they may awaken the Father.

320943.「あの時 ポルるん……\n ルティアナの被造物たる 誓約の子らを\n 感じ取り:
At that time, Porlun sensed the children of
the covenant, the creatures of Lutiana, and
called out to them...

320944.「女神ゼネシアさま。\n その 守護天使たちは 今 どこに？:
Goddess Zenethia. Where are those protection
angels now?

320945.「この考えに至りしとき わたくしは みずから\n ゼニアス中に 呼びかけてみまし:
When I came up with this idea, I called out to
all of Zeniath, but not a single person
responded...

320946.「ですが かすかな気配は 感じます。\n おそらく ジア・クトとの戦いで 傷つき:
But I do sense a faint presence. Perhaps the
battle with Dia Kut has left him wounded, and
he has lost the strength to respond.

320947.「ネーしゃま！ メレちー！\n 前から 気になってたんだけど\n あそこに ある:
I've always wondered if that thing over there
looks like a statue of an angel.

320948.「う～ん……遠くて よく見えないよー。\n 向こう岸へ渡る橋は 落ちちゃってるし:
Hmmm...it's too far away to see well. The
bridge to the other side of the river has
fallen down. I'm curious about that statue.

320949.「ゼニスの封宮の時みたいに\n <pc>の 聖天のつばさで\n 空を飛べたら い:
It would be nice if I could fly with
<pc> Wonderwing like in Palace of
Zenith...

320950.「まあ……。アストルティアには 神気を\n 飛行のチカラに変える道具が あるので:
Well...Astoltia has the tools to transform the
divine energy into the power of flight. Please
wait a moment.

320951.「これで わたくしの神気が ゼニアスの地を\n 満たしました。守護天使たちを 捜:
Now that my divine energy has filled the land
of Zeniath, I am sure it will help you in your
search for the protection angels...

320953.「……申し訳…ありません。ポルるん……。\n どうやら……少しばかり……\n チ:
...Sorry... Poruruun... It seems I used a
little too much power...

320955.「ネーしゃま つらそうだったね。\n 聖天のつばさを 使えるようにするために\n:
Zenny, it must have been tough on you, you
worked so hard to get Wonderwing working for
you...

320956.「しばらく休めば 回復するって言葉を 信じて\n 私たちに できることを やるし:
We'll just have to take their word for it and
do what we can to recover.

320957.「そーだね。パパゼニスさまが\n 目を覚ましたら きっと 創失の呪いだって\n:
That's right. When Papa Zenith wakes up, I'm
sure he will do something about the curse of
unmaking!

320958.「手がかりは ウォルドの守護天使像ね。\n さっそく 聖天のつばさで 向こう岸に:
The clue is the Guardian Angel Statue in
Angelfall. Let's cross over to the other side
of the river with Wonderwing and check it out!

320959.「よーし <pc>隊長\n ばんばん 守護天使たちを 見つけちゃおう！:
Alright <pc> Captain Banban, let's
find those protection angels!

320960.ゼニアスでも 霊子の見える場所なら\n聖天のつばさで 空を飛べるようになった。\:
Now you can fly with Wonderwing in Zeniath as
long as you can see the spirit. Let's check
out the Guardian Angel Statue in Angelfall.<me 71>

320961.「こちらが 各地の守護天使たちを 見つけた際に\n 預かったという ３つの品です:
These are the three items that were given to
you when you found the protection angels in
the various locations?

320962.「弓と 弦と 矢……。\n ずいぶん古めかしいものの ようですが\n はてさて:
A bow, a string, and an arrow... It looks very
old-fashioned, but what am I supposed to do
with this...?

320963.「弓と弦と矢ってんなら 答えは決まってるさ。:
If you're talking about bows, strings, and
arrows, the answer is obvious.

320964.「……ここは 俺に まかせな。\n 手先の器用さにゃあ\n ちょいとばかり 自信:
Leave this to me. I have a little confidence
in my dexterity.

320966.ナブレット団長の手によって 大樹の弓\n女神の弦 星封の矢の ３つの神器は\nゆ:
By the hand of Captain Nablette, the Oaken
BowGoddess Chords Benevarrow's three sacred
vessels were reborn as the Bow of the Cradle!<me 72>

320968.「さっすが ナブおじさん！\n でも この弓を 何に使うんだろうね？: But what will he use this bow for?

320969.「みんなが 守護天使を捜してる間に 調べたの。\n この はじまりの地の湖にある:
While everyone was looking for the protection angel, I did some research. That islet in the lake here in the Land of Beginnings... doesn't
it look like the eye of the lake?

320970.「たしかに あの小島ならば 湖の目と呼ぶに\n 相応しいけど……とすると 守護天:
Yes, that islet deserves to be called the eye
of the lake... but then, protection angel
Magiel is not going to meet us so easily.

320971.「この湖一帯は 聖なる結界で 守られている。\n 何らかの資格を有する者か 定め:
This area of the lake is protected by a sacred ward. You can't even get close to it unless you have some kind of credentials or follow
the prescribed procedures.

320972.「ふむ……困りましたね。\n これから どうしたら……: Hmmm...I'm at a loss. What should I do now...

320974.<center>３人の守護天使に 認められし\n誓約の子らよ……:
Children of the covenant, recognized by the
three protection angels...

320975.<center>我が名は ウォルドの守護天使\nマギエル:
My name is Magiel, the protection angel of
Angelfall.

320976.<center>ゆりかごの弓を 手に取り\n湖に浮かぶ小島へ 矢を放て\nさすれ:
Take the Bow of the Cradle in your hand and
shoot an arrow into the islet on the lake, and
the way will be opened for you...

320977.「今の声……ウォルドの天使像の\n るすばんメッセージと 同じ声だよ！\n メレ:
The voice you just heard...it's the same voice
as the angel statue at Angelfall's cruise ship
message!

320978.「<pc>隊長！\n この大役は 隊長に まかせたよ！:
<pc> Captain! I've entrusted you
with this great task!

320979.ゆりかごの弓で 湖の小島へ \n矢を 放ってみますか？<yesno><close:
Would you like to try shooting an arrow into
the islet of the lake with the Bow of the
Cradle?<yesno><close>

320980.「んも～！ もったいつけないで！\n ほらほらっ <pc>隊長っ。\n 最後の守:
Don't be mopey! Don't waste it! Come on, come
on, <pc> Captain. Let's go meet the
last protection angel!

320981.<pc>は 湖の小島へ 矢を放った！:
<pc> fired an arrow into the islet
of the lake!

320982.ゆりかごの弓は はじけ飛び\n湖の小島まで 光の橋が かかった！:
The Bow of the Cradle burst into flame and a
bridge of light reached the islet of the lake!

320985.「……湖上に浮かぶ島は 聖なる地。\n 選ばれし者以外 決して立ち入らせるなと\:
The island on the lake is a sacred place. The
Lord has given strict orders that only the
chosen may enter.

320986.「その聖なる地に おまえたち……何をした！: What have you done to this holy place?

320987.「だから あたしたちが 選ばれし者なんだよ。\n ほら その光る橋を 見て！\n:
That's why we are the chosen ones. Look at
that shiny bridge! Isn't it just like a
wellcome sponge?

320988.「ねえ ラキ。あの小島のことが 気になるなら\n お目付役として あなたが\n:
Hey Raki, if you care about that islet, maybe
you could follow us as a chaperone?

320990.「では <pc>隊長 ポルテ君\n メレアーデ王女と そのお目付役 ラキ君。:
Now, <pc> Captain Porte, Princess
Mereade and her chaperone Raki.

320991.「湖の小島の調査 および\n ウォルドの守護天使 マギエル捜索は\n みなさんに:
The investigation of the islet of the lake and
the search for the protection angel Magiel of
PrepAngelfall are left to you!

320993.「あら……？ <pc>。\n この像って もしかして……:
Oops...? <pc>. Could this statue
possibly be...?

320994.「そう。女神ルティアナさまは\n ゼネシアねえさまの 妹君で……\n ラキの ち:
Yes, Goddess Lutiana is Zenethia's sister and
Raki's little sister.

320995.「女神ルティアナさまも\n ネーしゃまも いかにも 女神さま～って\n 神々しい:
Goddess Lutiana and Zenny are both divine,
like goddesses, aren't they?

320999.「女神ルティアナさま……？\n すでに 亡くなられたのでは……。:
Goddess Lutiana...? I thought she had already
passed away...

321003.「るすばんメッセージを 考えたときは\n あたしたち調査隊が こんなに デキるヤ:
I guess he didn't realize how talented we, the
survey team, were when he came up with the
evening's message.

321004.「ふっふっふ……ルティアナさま。\n とっくに ジア・クトは いなくなったし\n:
Pfft...Lutiana. Dia Kut is long gone and Zenny
was saved by Captain <pc>!

321005.「もしかして 他の像にも\n 私たちへの伝言が 遺されているのかしら？:
I wonder if the other statues have a message
for us?

321006.「だよね メレちー！\n さっそく 他の像も 調べてみよう！:
I'll check out the other statues as soon as I
can!

321007.<pc>たちは 広場に置かれた\n神々の像を くわしく調べ 呼びかけてみたが\n:
<pc> and others checked the Statue
of the Gods in the plaza and called out to it,
but received no response...

321008.「ネーしゃまってば 何度 話しかけても\n ぜんぜん 返事してくれないよ！\n:
Zenny doesn't respond at all no matter how
many times I try to talk to her!

321009.「……ねえさまに 用があるなら\n 本物と 話せばいい。:
If you want to talk to her, talk to the real
one.

321011.「……てことで！\n 目指すは あの神殿だね！:
So...that's it! The goal is the "Temple of",
right?

321012.「女神ルティアナさまが 言うとおり\n てっぺんにある 神殿まで\n 守護天使マ:
Goddess Lutiana is right, let's go to the
temple at the top of the mountain to see the
protection angel Magiel!

321014.「いや～っ 遠路はるばる ご苦労さん！\n あんの ヘンクツじいさんの 無茶振り:
Thank you for making the long trip! I'm amazed that you were able to respond to my old man Henkutz's reckless request. How wonderful, how
wonderful!

321015.「ん？ ルティアナちゃんの かわいいお姿が\n 見えねえようだが\n アンタらと:
Hmm? I can't seem to see Lutiana's cute little
figure, but isn't she with you guys?

321016.「……いいぜ。言われなくても 感じるサ。\n あれから ずいぶん 経ったもんなあ:
I like it. I can feel it without being told. It's been a long time since then. I'm glad you're back safe and sound, even if it's just
your family.

321017.「我こそは ウォルドの守護天使 マギエル！\n 誓約の子ご一行様！\n アンタら:
I am Magiel, the protection angel of
Angelfall!

321018.「ええっ……マギエルぅ！？\n だって おじさん……\n パパゼニスさま そっく: Magiel? You look just like Papa Zenith!

321019.「そうとも 誓約の子らよ！: Yes, and children of the covenant!

321020.「かつて ジア・レド・ゲノス率いる侵略者……\n ジア・クト念晶体との戦いに 終:
To put an end to the war against the invaders
Dia Kut telecrystal led by Dia Ledo Genos,
Gran Zenith unleashed the curse of unmaking!

321021.「……ジア・クト去りし後\n かの おそるべき呪いが 我が身を蝕み\n いずれ:
I know that after Dia Kut's death, a terrible
curse will consume me, and I will eventually
lose my sanity.

321022.「そこで！ あのじいさん 自分を封印する前に\n 自分の記憶と意志を オレに 受:
So..! Before he sealed himself away, the old
man ordered me to take over his memories and
will, and wait for Lutiana.

321023.「それ以来 オレは 昔のイケてる姿とは\n 似ても 似つかねえ 主神そっくりの\:
Since then, I've had a face that looks just
like the Lord God's. I'm not even close to the
handsome face I used to have.

321024.「ねえ マギちん！\n なんで この神殿に 隠れてたの？\n 守護天使３人 見つ:
Hey, Maggie-chan, why were you hiding in this
Temple of? Why were you hiding in this Temple
of Protection?

321025.「ジア・クト念晶体との戦いから\n 身を守るため……ですか？:
To protect yourself from fighting Dia Kut
telecrystal...?

321026.「ま そいつも 理由のひとつにゃ\n ちがいねぇ……かナ～？: Well, that must be one of the reasons...right?

321027.「で？ どうだい あのじいさんは。\n 下界から 創失の呪いの気配を 感じるよう:
So? How is that old man? I can feel the presence of the curse of unmaking from the lower world, but can't you do anything about
it?

321028.<pc>は 女神ゼネシアから\n主神グランゼニスを 目覚めさせるため\n守護天使:
<pc> explained that Goddess Zenethia
asked him to find a protection angel to awaken
Gran Zenith!

321029.「……誓約の子らよ。\n 少しばかり 昔話をしてやろう。:
...children of the covenant. Let me tell you a
little tale from the past.

321030.「かつて 我 グランゼニスは\n 己を唯一絶対とする 驕れる神であったが\n …:
Once I, Gran Zenith, was a conceited god who
thought himself the only absolute, but someone
corrected my mistake.

321031.「創造主といえど ひとりでは判断を誤る。\n ……ゆえに その者が去りし後\n:
Even the Creator alone makes mistakes in
judgment. Therefore, after he left, I gave
birth to two goddesses.

321032.「女神ゼネシアと 女神ルティアナ。\n ……ふたりの 我が娘を。:
Goddess Zenethia and Goddess Lutiana, my two
daughters.

321033.「ひとつの まばゆき光は 必ず影を作る。\n されど もうひとつの光が 異なる側:
One bright light always casts a shadow. But if another light shines on the shadows from a different side, the whole world is enveloped
in light.

321034.「ルティアナは ゼネシアのために。\n ゼネシアは ルティアナのために……\n:
Lutiana for Zenethia, Zenethia for Lutiana...
I commanded my daughters to complement and
help each other.

321035.「……ふたりの女神さまって\n まるで 勇者と盟友のようね。<pc>。:
...the two goddesses are like Hero and ally.
<pc>.

321036.「主神の座の継承に ふたつの神具……\n 王笏と王冠が 必要なのも 愛する娘たち:
The fact that two divine artifacts, a scepter and a crown, are required for the succession to the throne of the Lord God means that the
two beloved daughters should get along well with each other.

321037.「ところがだ！ 娘たちの成長を待ってた ある日\n ジア・クト念晶体が 攻めてき:
But then! I was waiting for my daughters to grow up when one day the Dia Kut telecrystal invaded and began to encroach on the land of
Zeniath one by one.

321038.「追い詰められた じいさんは もはやこれまでと\n ゼネシアを眠らせ ルティアナ:
Cornered, Grandpa decided it was time to let
Zenethia sleep and let Lutiana go, breaking
the curse of unmaking...

321039.「お偉い 神さまだって\n しょせんは 人の親。\n ……自分の娘にゃ めっぽう:
Even the great God is a human parent. He's
very lenient with his own daughters.

321040.「とうさまは 強く やさしい！\n そして ねえさまや ちいねえさま……\n み:
The father was strong and kind! And he loved
everyone, including Nee-sama and Little Nee-
sama.

321041.「アンタら 創生のチカラの源が なんなのか\n 考えたことは あるかい？:
Have you ever wondered what the source of the
power of creation is?

321042.「ん～と……。\n すごーい神さまだけが 持ってる\n はちゃめちゃ・スペシャル:
Well... The crazy, special, amazing power that
only the amazing God possesses?

321043.「ん～ いいセンいってるけど ちと違う。\n 創生のチカラ それは……\n ずば:
Well~ You say good Sen, but that's not quite
right. The power of creation is... love!

321044.「考えてもみろよ？ なーんもねえ\n さっみし～い 無から 世界を生み出すなんて:
Think about it, Miro. It's not easy to create
a world out of nothing.

321045.「どんな世界なら 暮らしやすいだろう。\n どんな生き物がいたら 楽しいだろう…:
What kind of world would be a comfortable place to live? What kind of creatures would be fun to live with... If you don't think about
each one of these things, you can't create life.

321046.「新たなる世界 新たなる生命への\n あふれんばかりの愛……\n それこそが 創:
The overflowing love for the new world and new
life...that is the power of creation.

321047.「天地創造の 神さまなんて\n 愛情深くなきゃ やってらんネーからナァ。:
The God of Creation has to be loving or he
wouldn't be able to do what he does.

321048.「……だからこそ あの日。\n 主神グランゼニスの絶望が\n かの 創失の呪いを:
That is why the despair of Gran Zenith gave
birth to the curse of unmaking...

321049.「もー！ マギちん 話が長いよー！\n その 創失の呪いを なんとかするために\:
Mooo! Magichin, it's a long story! Zenny asked
me to do something about that unmaking curse!

321050.「すまねえなあ。何万年も 神殿の中に\n 引きこもってたせいで 誰かと しゃべん:
I'm sorry. I've been cooped up in the temple
for tens of thousands of years, so I was too
happy to talk to someone and got excited.

321051.「……短い間にしろ じいさんが\n アンタら ルティアナちゃんの眷属との接触で\:
If it is true that Grandpa was awakened by the
contact with you and Lutiana's family, however
briefly...

321052.「オレたち ４人の守護天使 全員が\n じいさんのトコに戻りゃ 創生のチカラが強:
If all four of us, the four protection angels, return to Grandpa's place, our power of creation will be strengthened and we may be
able to defeat the unmaking curse.

321053.「……だが 危うい賭けだ。\n うまく運びゃあ ゼニアスは救われるが\n 最悪の:
But it's a risky gamble. If all goes well,
Zeniath will be saved, but if all goes badly,
even the last hope is lost...

321055.「創失の呪いは ゼニアスにとどまらず\n すでに 我等が世界\n アストルティア:
The curse of unmaking is not limited to
Zeniath, but has already taken its toll on our
world of Astoltia!

321056.「もはや ゼニアスのみの 問題ではない。\n どんなわずかな可能性であろうとも\:
It is no longer a question of Zeniath alone.
We must test every possibility, no matter how
small...

321057.「……いいぜ 同行しよう。\n オレたち ゼニアス最後の守護天使は\n ルティア:
I'll go with you. We, the last protection
angels of Zeniath, leave everything to the
children of Lutiana!

321058.「じゃあ あたしたちと\n いっしょに 来てくれるんだね。マギちん！: So you're coming with us? Magichin!

321059.「おう まかせときな！\n いっちょ じいさんのとこへ 出発しますか！: I'll leave it to you! Let's go to Grandpa's!

321060.「来い！ ゼニアスの守護天使……\n 最後の生き残りたちよ！:
Come! Zeniath's PROTECTION angels...the last
survivors!

321061.「……なつかしい顔ぶれだ。\n 二度と 同胞に会えぬまま 最後の日を迎えると\n:
...It's a familiar group of faces. I thought I would face my last day without seeing my compatriots again, but I am happy to be able
to gather here like this.

321062.「主神グランゼニス様の おひざもと以外は\n ジア・クトに滅ぼされてしまったから:
Dia Kut destroyed everything but Gran Zenith's
hometown... It is a miracle that we survived.

321063.「はい。幸運にも 私たちは 生命尽きる前に\n ルティアナ様の眷属が ゼニアスに:
Yes, we are fortunate to be here. We are fortunate to be able to celebrate this joyous occasion of the return of Lutiana's dependents
to Zeniath before life runs out...

321064.「……ああ。今日から すべてが始まるんだ。\n みんな 長い間 ご苦労だったナ。:
Yeah. It all starts today. Thank you all for
your hard work over the years.

321065.「かつて 女神の果実を実らせ お役御免になった\n オレたち天使が ふたたび 創:
We angels, who once bore the fruit of the goddess and were then dismissed, were reincarnated to protect the world of Zeniath
and its people.

321066.「ジア・クトが 撤退し\n ルティアナちゃんの眷属が帰ってきた 今こそ！\n 我:
Now that Dia Kut has retreated and Lutiana's dependents have returned, it is time for us to fulfill our last duty as protection angels!
Now is the time to fulfill the last duty of our protection angels!

321067.「ゼニアスの 大いなる創造主\n 主神グランゼニスよ！: O Gran Zenith, Great Creator of Zeniath!

321068.「我ら 守護天使が宿したる 創生のチカラ\n 今こそ 御許へ お返ししよう！:
Now is the time to return the power of
creation that our protection angel possesses!

321069.「さようなら ムニエカの民よ……。\n あなたたちを 心から 愛していました……:
Farewell, people of Munieka... I loved you
with all my heart.

321070.「俺には もう無理だけど……\n <cs_pchero>は ティセとまた一緒に\:
I can't do it anymore...but <cs_pchero>
should go to the Cocken Festival with Tise
again.

321071.「我は 守護天使 バトラエル。\n だが お前たちが呼ぶ\n トラちゃんという響:
I am a protection angel, Batrael, but the
sound of Contagie as you call it...wasn't bad
at all.

321073.「マギちん……？ みんな！？\n なんで いなくなっちゃったの……？:
Maggichin...? Everyone! Why did they
disappear...?

321074.「天使の肉体は 創生のチカラ そのもの。\n みんな とうさまに それを返した。:
The body of an angel is the power of creation
itself. They all returned it to the Tzu.
That's why... they disappeared.

321075.「<cs_pchero>隊長！ 起きた！\n パパゼニスさまが 起きたよっ！:
<cs_pchero> Captain! I'm up! Papa Zenith is
awake!

321079.「女神ルティアナが創造せし 新世界\n ……その名は アストルティア。:
A new world created by the Goddess Lutiana,
named Astoltia.

321080.「我らが女神は 七柱の兄弟神を 創造し\n 七柱の兄弟神たちは それぞれの眷属…:
Our Goddess created the Seven Pillars of Brother Gods, and the Seven Pillars of Brother Gods created their dependents, the Seven
Races, with the power of creation.

321081.「あまたの困難 あまたの災いが 世界を襲ったが\n 七つの種族たちは みな チカ:
Many difficulties and many calamities have
struck the world, but the seven races have all
worked together to overcome the hardships.

321082.「その要……すべての種族と 神々を束ね\n アストルティアを救いし 新世界の守り:
The keystone... the guardian of the new world who unites all the races and gods, who saves Astoltia, is ... the one who is
here.

321110.「とうさまに お仕えした日々\n ラキは……幸せでした。:
The days I spent serving you, Raki, were...
happy.

321115.「……んぅ。\n なぁにぃ？ まだ 眠いよお……。: Hmm... What is it? I'm still sleepy...

321119.「どうか 早まらないでくださいませ……！\n 創失の呪いの源を 消し去る方法は\:
Please don't be hasty, there must be other
ways to eliminate the source of the curse of
unmaking!

321121.「ふたつの世界を苦しめた 創失の呪いは\n ……完全に 消え去りました……。:
The curse of unmaking that afflicted the two
worlds is completely gone...

321122.「……けれど 引き替えに\n とこしえのゆりかご ゼニアス……\n この世界を:
But in exchange, Eternal Cradle Zeniath, the
god who created this world, has disappeared.

321123.「妹 ルティアナも亡き 今……\n どうして わたくしひとりが 生き残り\n …:
Now that my sister Lutiana is gone, how is it
that I am the only one left alive and left
behind?

321124.「この王笏に宿るチカラは 計り知れぬもの。\n それでも 世界をよみがえらせるに:
The power that resides in this scepter is immeasurable. And yet it is not enough to bring the world back to life. I, who am not
the Lord God, cannot do it alone...

321126.「グランゼニスさまはね もうひとり……\n アストルティアにも いるよ！: There is another Gran Zenith in Astoltia!

321128.「ええ。さきほど 主神グランゼニスさまは\n 女神ルティアナ様の子 継承者グラン:
Yes. Earlier, Gran Zenith said that Goddess
Lutiana's son and heir, Gran Zenith, will save
the world...

321129.「そして 私たちは 主神グランゼニスさまに\n 約束したのです。必ず アストルテ:
And we promised Gran Zenith that we would bring the human god Gran Zenith from Astoltia. We promised Gran Zenith that we would bring
the human god Gran Zenith from Astoltia.

321130.「お教えくださいませ <cs_pchero> みなさん！\n ルティアナの子 グ:
Please let me know <&13_aaaaaaaac> Everyone,
is Gran Zenith, Lutiana's child, still alive?

321131.「伝説だと 人間の神グランゼニスさまは\n 神話時代の戦い以来 アストルティアの:
Legend has it that the human god Gran Zenith
has fallen asleep somewhere in Astoltia since
the mythical battle!

321132.「傷つき 滅びかけた この世界……\n ゼニアスを よみがえらせることができるの:
Only the new Lord God can bring Zeniath back
to life.

321133.「<cs_pchero> みなさん。\n どうか 継承者グランゼニスを 捜し出し:
<cs_pchero> Ladies and gentlemen. Please
help us find our successor, Gran Zenith, and
lead him to Zeniath.

321134.「ラキも 継承者グランゼニスを 捜したい。\n <cs_pchero>……ラキを:
Raki also wants to find his successor, Gran
Zenith. <cs_pchero>...Take Raki to
Astoltia!

321135.「わたくしからも お願いいたします。\n <cs_pchero>……。\n どう:
Please! <cs_pchero>... Please take Raki
with you.

321136.「あらたなる主神の座を 継承するためには\n 父が遺した この王笏と もうひとつ:
To succeed to the throne of the new Lord God, I need this scepter left by my father and another divine artifact, the missing crown of
the Lord God...

321137.「わたくしは 主神の王冠を探します。\n あなたがたは 継承者グランゼニスを\n:
I seek the crown of the Lord God. Please, you
are the heirs of Gran Zenith!

321138.「はやく 出発しよう <cs_pchero>。\n 継承者を 捜しに！:
Let's get a move on <cs_pchero>. To find
the heir!

321139.「そう せかすものでは ありませんよ。ラキ。\n ……旅立ちの前に <cs_pc:
I will not be so hasty, Raki...before I leave
<cs_pchero> to thank you.

321140.「創失の呪いの源を 断ち切り\n ゼニアスと アストルティアを\n 救ってくださ:
For breaking the source of the curse of
unmaking and saving Zeniath and Astoltia...

321141.「……亡き 我が父\n 主神グランゼニスに代わり 感謝いたします。\n <cs_:
On behalf of my late father, Gran Zenith, I
thank you. <cs_pchero>.

321142.「ラキ。アストルティアで\n 継承者グランゼニスを 見つけたら\n すぐに わた:
Raki, as soon as you find the heir Gran Zenith
in Astoltia, let me know.

321143.「……これで いつでも わたくしに\n 呼びかけられます。おいたをして ポルるん:
Now you can call on me at any time. I don't
mean to annoy you or Poruru by playing tricks
on you.

321144.「……しばし お別れですね。\n <cs_pchero> メレちー ポルるん。:
...I guess this is goodbye for now.
<cs_pchero> Merry Porurun.

321145.「ルティアナの子 継承者グランゼニスと ともに\n あなたがたが ゼニアスに帰る:
I await your return to Zeniath with Gran
Zenith, son of Lutiana, heir to the Grounds of
the Covenant...

321146.「ネーしゃま まっかせて～！！\n あたしたちが すぐに\n まごゼニスさま 見:
Zenny, wait for me~! We'll find you soon,
Magozenith-sama!

321147.「やーっと 創失の呪い やっつけたね！\n <cs_pchero>隊長！:
Yay, the curse of unmaking defeated!
<cs_pchero> Captain!

321148.「まさか 主神グランゼニスさまが\n 自らを犠牲にして 呪いを消し去るなんて\n:
I never thought that Gran Zenith would
sacrifice himself to make the curse go away,
but...

321149.「その おかげで 私だって\n こうして 呪いから救われたのよね。\n もしかし:
It's because of that that I was saved from the
curse. Could it be that Aunt Marone is
also...?

321150.「……そうよ！ 私 どうして忘れてたの？\n <cs_pchero>の お母さん:
Yes! How did I forget? <cs_pchero>'s
mother's name is Aunt Marone!

321151.「<cs_pchero>隊長！\n すぐに アストルティアに帰って 確かめよう！:
<cs_pchero> Captain! Let's go back to
Astoltia right away and find out for sure!

321152.<cs_pchero>たちは ラキを連れて\nはじまりの地へ戻り 調査隊のメンバ:
and his team returned to the Land of Beginnings with Raki and reported to the members of the survey team that the source
of the curse of unmaking had been severed.

321153.調査隊の面々は 主神グランゼニスの死や\nラキの正体に 驚きながらも\n呪いが消:
The investigators were surprised by Gran
Zenith's death and Raki's true identity, but
were delighted that the curse was gone.

321154.創失の呪いの 解決を機に 燈火の調査隊は\nいったん 解散することとなった……。:
With the resolution of the unmaking curse, the
Ember Explorers were temporarily disbanded...

321156.「またも お前に 助けられたな。\n ……<cs_pchero>。:
Once again, you saved my life.
...<cs_pchero>.

321157.「創失……というものに 飲み込まれた後\n 私は 果てなき暗闇の中に いました。:
After being swallowed by something called
unmaking, I was in an endless darkness.

321158.「天も地もなき闇の中 助けを求め\n 逃げ出す方法を探して さまよえども\n 音:
In the darkness where there is no heaven or earth, I wander around looking for help and a way to escape, but the soundless darkness only
spreads.

321159.「……いつしか 私は 自分が どこから来たのか\n どこへ帰ろうとしていたかを:
Someday I forgot where I came from and where I
was going home. It was as if my heart had been
swallowed by the darkness.

321160.「どれほどの時間が 経ったのか……\n 自分が 誰だったのかすら 忘れかけた私が:
I don't know how much time has passed since I
almost forgot who I was, when I gave up
everything.

321161.「突然 暗闇の中に まばゆい光が差し込み\n ……光へと 必死に手を伸ばすうちに:
Suddenly, in the darkness, there was a blinding light... and as I desperately reached for the light, I was brought back into the
world.

321162.「あふれる光に包まれた時 <cs_pchero>……\n あなたの声が 聞こえた:
As I was surrounded by the overflowing light
<cs_pchero> I thought I heard your voice.

321163.「再び こうして 親子３人で 笑いあえるのは\n あなたの おかげなのね……。\:
It is thanks to you that the three of us,
father and son, are able to laugh together
again like this... Thank you <cs_pchero>.

321164.「調査に向かった世界 ゼニアスで\n 私も 身をもって 創失を体験しました。:
I experienced unmaking firsthand in Zeniath,
the world where I went to do research.

321165.「創失の呪いを 受けた時……\n 自分が 真っ暗な世界へと ずぶずぶと沈んで\n:
When I received the curse of unmaking... it
was as if I was sinking into a pitch-dark
world and disappearing without a trace.

321166.「もしも あなたたちが いなかったら\n あのまま 私も マローネ叔母様も\n:
If it hadn't been for you two, I might never
have made it back, and Aunt Marone might never
have made it back, either, right?

321167.「ああ……。無事で なによりだぞ。\n メレアーデ。お前に 何かあったら\n 亡:
Ah... I'm glad you're safe, Mereade. I'm glad you are safe, Mereade, for if anything had happened to you, I would not be able to
forgive my late brother Domineus.

321168.「創失の呪いは 異世界ゼニアスの創造神が\n ジア・クト念晶体の侵略を 退けるた:
The curse of unmaking is said to have been created by the creator gods of the other world Zeniath to repel the invasion of Dia Kut
telecrystal.

321169.「全知全能の神様 本人ですら\n 制御しきれぬほどの すさまじい呪いでしたが\n:
The curse was so terrible that even God
Almighty could not control it, but with God's
death, the curse disappeared.

321170.「安心して 叔父様 叔母様。\n もう二度と 誰かが 消えることはないわ。:
Rest assured, Uncle Aunt. No one will ever
disappear again.

321171.「ああ。我が自慢の子 <cs_pchero>が\n またも 世界を救ってくれた。:
Ah. My proud boy <cs_pchero> has saved the
world again. My father would be proud.

321172.「異世界の調査は 大変だったのでしょう？\n 当分 家で のんびりなさいな。\n:
It must have been hard for you to investigate
other worlds, wasn't it? You should go home
and relax for the time being. <cs_pchero>...

321173.「ダメダメ！ ネーしゃまに\n まごゼニスさまを 捜してくるって\n 約束したん:
No, no, no! I promised Zenny I'd go find
Magozenith-sama~!

321174.「ゼニアスには 新たな主神が 必要。\n ……ラキは ねえさまに 頼まれた。\n:
Zeniath needs a new master god. Raki was asked
by his lady to find Gran Zenith.

321175.「君たちは……？\n どういうことなのだ <cs_pchero>。:
You guys are...? What do you mean
<cs_pchero>.

321176.<cs_pchero>は パドレに\nアストルティアのどこかに眠る 人間の神\n:
<cs_pchero> explained to Padre that Alto
needed to find the human god Gran Zenith, who
lay somewhere in Astoltia!

321177.「……そうか。アストルティアの祖となる世界\n ゼニアスを 救うためとあらば\n:
Well, if you want to save the world of
Zeniath, the ancestral home of Astoltia, then
by all means I must help you.

321178.「旧き世界からの客人よ。\n しばらく 時間をくれぬか。世界中に遺された\n グ:
Guests from the old world. Give us a moment of your time. Let us collect the lore of Gran Zenith bequeathed to us from all over the
world.

321179.「しばらくは……どれくらい？\n ゼニアスには 今 主神がいない。\n ラキは:
Zeniath does not have a god right now, and
Raki wants to look for one immediately...

321180.「やみくもに 捜しても 見つからないわ。\n まずは アストルティアについて\n:
You won't find it by searching blindly. First
of all, you need to learn more about Astoltia.

321181.「そうね……ラキと ポルテちゃんは しばらく\n エテーネの村に滞在しては どう:
Well...why don't Raki and Porte stay at Ethene
Village for a while? I will contact Shini and
let her know.

321182.「エテーネの村って どんなとこかな？\n いいとこだったら ネーしゃまも\n 連:
What do you think of Ethene Village? If it's a
nice place, I'd like to bring Zenny there too!

321183.「……ねえさまは ゼニアスを守る神。\n それに 主神の王冠を 探さねばならない:
...you are the god who protects Zeniath.
Besides, I have to find the crown of the Lord
God, I can't leave Zeniath.

321184.「もー。ラキってば 頭カタいよ～。\n それじゃ <cs_pchero>隊長！\:
Raki, you're so hard-headed! Well then,
<cs_pchero> Captain! We're going to Ethene
Village, aren't we?

322182.<center>長きにわたる忠誠 まこと ご苦労であった\n……今 この時より:
I thank you for your long and faithful service, and from this moment on, I relieve you of your divine beast duties, and from now
on, you may live freely.

322184.<center>我が身より出でて 我が身 深くに巣喰いし\n創失の呪いは 誓約の:
The curse of unmaking, which came from my body
and ate deep within me, was overthrown by the
children of the covenant and others.

322185.<center>今 この時より 創失の呪いは\nふたつの世界から 完全に消え去る:
From this moment on, the curse of unmaking
will disappear completely from the two
worlds... along with me!

322186.<center>さらばだ 愛しき子らよ\n手を取りあい 正しき道を 歩め……:
Farewell, my dear children, take each other's
hands and walk the path of righteousness...

322188.<center>……我が娘 ゼネシアよ\nこたび…こそ ゼニアスを…守れ……:
My daughter Zenethia, now it is your duty to
protect Zeniath.

322189.<center>じゃあな アンタら……あとは うまくやれよ\n超絶イケてる オレ:
Well, you guys... you're gonna have to do better than that, because I'm really hot. The only regret I have is that I didn't get to
show you my true colors...

322191.<center>どれほど 帰りを 待ちわびたことだろう\n愛しき娘ルティアナ……:
How I have longed for the return of my beloved
daughter Lutiana and her children of the
covenant to the Eternal Cradle.

322192.<center>聞かせよ 新たなる天地が いかなるものか\n新たなる生命 新たな:
Tell me, what is the new heaven and the new
earth, the new life, the new world, and how my
daughter rules over it?

322193.<center>……なるほど 誓約の子らが 無事 ゼニアスに\n帰還できたのは:
I see that it is thanks to you that the
children of the covenant have returned safely
to Zeniath, and I thank you <cs_pchero>...

322194.<center>我が娘 女神ルティアナは\nその旅立ちの日に こう 誓ってくれた:
My daughter, Goddess Lutiana, swore to me on
the day of her departure.

322195.<center>父 主神グランゼニスより 受け継ぎし\n創生のチカラにて 私は:
With the power of creation inherited from my
father, Gran Zenith, I will create a new world
in the unknown sky...

322196.<center>そして いつの日か 新たなるグランゼニス……\n父の名を継ぐ神と:
And I vow that one day I will return with a
new Gran Zenith a god in my father's name to
save my sisters Zenethia and Zeniath.

322209.<center>ようこそ 私の愛し子よ……\n誓約の園まで よくぞ 無事に たど:
Welcome, my dear child to the Grounds of the
Covenant.

322210.<center>天上の楽園……誓約の園は\n我ら ゼニアスの神々が住まう 聖なる:
Utopia... Grounds of the Covenant is the place
where the power of creation is strongest,
where the gods of Zeniath reside.

322211.<center>誓約を守り この地に還り来たりし 愛し子のため\nとこしえのゆり:
For the sake of those who have kept their vows and returned to this land and for the sake of my beloved child, I leave you my words before
I depart from the Eternal Cradle...

322212.<center>誓約の園の 頂へ至り\n神殿で待つ 守護天使マギエルに 会うがよ:
Reach the top of the Grounds of the Covenant
and meet Magiel, the protection angel, waiting
for you in the temple.

322213.<center>……そうして ジア・クトに 損なわれたる\nこの世界 ゼニアスと:
And so save this world Zeniath and my sister
Goddess Zenethia, which has been damaged by
Dia Kut...

322214.<center>しばらく……休めば 回復します……。\nどうか その間に……\n:
Rest a while and you will recover. In the
meantime, please... find... the protection
angel of Zeniath... and...

325231.「心配をかけましたね <cs_pchero>……。:
I'm sorry to have worried you
<cs_pchero>...

325232.守護天使を捜しおえた <pc>たちは\nメレアーデの提案で\nテントの外で 打ち:
After searching for the protection angel, and the others started meeting outside the tent at the suggestion of
Mereade...

325233.なんと 小島に ふしぎな建物が現れている。\n光の橋は どうやら ふしぎな建物の:
A mysterious building has appeared on the
islet. It seems that the bridge of light
continues to the mysterious building...

325234.<pc>たちは 光の橋を渡って\nふしぎな建物へ向かった……。:
<pc> and the others crossed the
bridge of light to the mysterious building...

325878.<center>ルティアナの命は 新世界にて 尽きたようだが\n娘に代わり 新た:
Lutiana's life seems to have ended in the New World, but in her daughter's place, a new god, the heir Gran Zenith, will save the Eternal
Cradle...

325879.<center>アストルティアの グランゼニスが\nゼニアスを訪れる……\nその:
I look forward to the day when Astoltia's Gran
Zenith visits Zeniath...

325880.「……ああ。必ず連れてくると 約束しよう。: Yeah. I promise I'll bring him back.

325881.<center>娘よ……\nそなたは ふたつの心を 持つようだな: My daughter you seem to have two minds.

325882.<center>そなたの もうひとつの心は\n必ずや そなたの助けと なるだろう:
Your other mind will surely help you, as it
did Lutiana and Zenethia...

325883.<center>……誓約の子らよ\nそなたらのアストルティアのためにも\n創失の:
For the sake of the children of the covenant
and all other Astoltia, the curse of unmaking
must be completely annihilated.

325885.<center>これなるは 我が身より生まれ\nゼニアスと アストルティアを苦し:
This is the source of the curse of unmaking,
which was born of me and torments Zeniath and
Astoltia...

325886.<center>誓約の子らよ こやつと 戦うのだ:
Children of the covenant, fight against this
thing.

325887.<center>ふたつの世界が 救われる道は\nすべての創失の呪い その源を断つ:
The only way the two worlds can be saved is to break the curse of all unmaking at its source... to follow Lutiana's oath and bring
him down.

325888.「またも 邪魔をするつもりか？: You're trying to get in my way again?

325889.「たとえ 創失の呪いの源であろうとも\n 主の写し身に ラキは 牙をむけられない:
Even if it is the source of unmaking curses,
Raki cannot turn on the Lord's copy.

325890.「……頼む <cs_pchero>。\n おまえの手で とうさまに巣喰いし 呪い:
Please <cs_pchero>. I beg you to defeat
with your own hands the source of the curse
that is nesting in your father.

325892.「……クッ。さすがは 呪いの親玉だ。\n ここまで…か……:
Kuhk. As expected of the master of the curse.
Up to here... huh...

325894.<center>創失の呪いの源よ 我がもとへ 戻れ……！:
Source of the curse of unmaking, return to
Me...!

325895.「えっ……？ なになに なにこれぇ！？\n どうしよ <cs_pchero>隊長:
What...? What, what, what, what, what, what, what, what, what, what, what, what, what, what, what, what! What do we do,
Captain!

325896.<center>おのれ……！\n守護天使たちに授けし 創生のチカラを\n取り戻し:
Even if I regain the power of creation that I
gave to the angels of protection, I still
can't match that curse..!

325898.「とうさまが愛した ゼニアスと\n ちいねえさまの子らを 守る……\n それが:
Raki's pledge is to protect the children of
Zeniath and Chiinee-sama, whom the father
loved so much!
